duration().details: A ballot should not be considered final until the duration has passed.

params._configured: The configuration of the funding cycle to check the state of.

returns._0: The state of the provided ballot.

duration().notice: The time that this ballot is active for.

reconfigurationDelay().notice: The number of seconds that must pass for a funding cycle reconfiguration to become active.

state(uint256,uint256).notice: The approval state of a particular funding cycle.

userdoc.notice: Manages votes towards approving funding cycle reconfigurations.
